column4: ï»¿a virus seems to have deleted the partition from my pendrive. i run mkfs.vfat /dev/sdc and it says "mkfs.vfat: Will not try to make filesystem on full-disk device '/dev/sdc' (use -I if wanted)" then I use -I and it says "mkfs.vfat: Attempting to create a too large file system" what the hell, its a 2gb pendrive
yes i need a partition, i want to create a partition, that was my point, so how do i do it, dont wanna graphical softwares
